metadata.title: CVE-2020-2229 jenkins: user-specified tooltip values leads to stored cross-site scripting (moderate)
metadata.description: DOCUMENTATION: A flaw was found in Jenkins in versions prior to 2.251 and LTS 2.235.3. Tooltip values, which are not properly escaped, can be contributed by plugins and use user-specified values. This results in a potential stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability. This highest threat from this vulnerability is to data confidentiality and integrity.

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9 is installed
jenkins is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
